start_group.title: Start new cover group
start_group.description: Enter the name for the new group, e.g. "Office Windows"

select_remote.title: Select Pico remote
select_remote.description:
Select the Pico remote device which is **already configured** in your Lutron Smart Bridge to control this cover group.

**NOTE** this helper component does not configure covers to respond to the selected Pico, you must do that separately in the Lutron Smart Bridge management interface (_e.g._ Lutron mobile app)

select_buttons.title: Assign buttons
select_buttons.description: Select the Pico button entities corresponding to the open, stop, and close actions.

select_covers.title: Select covers
select_covers.description:
Select the Lutron covers which belong to this group. These selections will be used only to present the group's state, and should reflect the configuration of this group in the Smart Bridge.

**NOTE** this helper component does not configure covers to respond to the selected Pico, you must do that separately in the Lutron Smart Bridge management interface (_e.g._ Lutron mobile app)

error.no_lutron_buttons: No Lutron button entities found. Please ensure Pico remotes are configured.
error.no_lutron_covers: No Lutron cover entities found. Please ensure covers are configured.
error.no_covers_selected: At least one cover must be selected

abort.no_lutron: Lutron Caseta integration not found. Please set it up first.

error.no_covers_selected: At least one cover must be selected
